data.eml:eml: Rhizophora mucronata var. alokii - a new variety of mangrove species from the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, India (Rhizophoraceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ragavan, P., Mohan, P. M., Jayaraj, R. S. C., Ravichandran, K., Saravanan, S. (2015): Rhizophora mucronata var. alokii - a new variety of mangrove species from the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, India (Rhizophoraceae). PhytoKeys 52: 95-103, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.52.5037, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.52.5037
